Class MenuItem

java.lang.Object
RRPSS.MenuItem
Direct Known Subclasses:
Dessert, Drinks, MainCourse, PromotionSet
public abstract class MenuItem extends Object
Represents a menu item object in the Menu.
Author:
Hans Farrell Soegeng
